values: 呼叫；叫喊；（通过广播）呼叫（飞机乘客登机）；叫（牌）；打电话给；打电话叫（医生、警察、出租车等）；称呼；命名；把…叫做；叫做；名为；给（婴儿、动物等）取名；认为…是；点（名）；传唤；呼唤；号召；传召；从（清单上）读出；拜访；短暂访问；召集；召唤；呼唤；敦促；大声说；大声呼叫；呼吁；取消；停止；要求；请求；安排；召集；命令；召（至某处）；跟（同样的赌注）；预测（政治、商业形势等）；判定；认为；大声宣告；授予…头衔；下令举行；（火车、船、公共汽车等）短暂停留；短暂停靠
呼吁；呼叫；叫喊；要求；请求；需求；打电话；通话；紧急请求；求救信号；拜访；访问；号召；召集；邀请；信号；决定；抉择；叫声；鸟鸣；（裁判员的）判决；（对商品、股票等的）购买权

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 访客；[通信] 呼叫者；打电话者；召集员
随时可偿还的；请求即付的
职业；欲望；点名；召集；邀请
召；呼唤（call的现在分词）；称之为

word_mean_info__list.difference: 非正式用词，含义广泛，指用说话或呼叫的形式召唤。
作“召唤”解时，语气较随便，暗示委派一件工作。
正式用词，指官方或正式的召集，召集者具有权力或权威性。
指给某人或某物取名字以某人或某物的特征称呼。
指用特别的名字、符号或词句来称某人或某物。
含义最泛，指给人或物命名以示区别或便于记忆。
指大声说话或喊叫，以引起某人的注意。
指因恐具、快乐或痛苦而发出的尖叫声。
多指求援、鼓励时的呼叫。也可指因外界因素刺激而发出尖厉声音。
指发出大而深沉的声音、吼叫或咆哮。
指因惊恐、痛苦等或其它感情而发出比scream更为尖锐、刺耳的叫声。
多指因高兴、愤怒、痛苦、惊讶等突发感情而高声喊叫。
指有意识地高声喊叫，常用于提出警告、发命令或唤起注意等。
一般指因恐惧、痛苦、惊奇等而喊叫。

word_group.brief_definition: 呼叫, 呼唤, 大喊
呼吁, 需求, 号召
回电话；回拨；叫（某人）回来
召集；给…打电话；顺道来访
名片；电话卡；电话计费卡；行为；结果
叫醒电话；令人惊醒的人
取消；喝退, 命令停止攻击

bilingual.source: The doctor responded to the urg call immediately.
bilingual.target: 医生立即回应了紧急呼叫。

bilingual.source: The policemen quickly responded to the emergency call.
bilingual.target: 警察迅速回应了紧急呼叫。

bilingual.source: Call the paramedics if someone is injured.
bilingual.target: 如果有人受伤，请呼叫急救人员。

bilingual.source: The medic quickly responded to the emergency call.
bilingual.target: 医务人员迅速回应了紧急呼叫。

bilingual.source: Pilots call out Mayday when they are in danger.
bilingual.target: 飞行员在遇到危险时会呼叫五月天。

bilingual.source: He responded instantaneously to the emergency call.
bilingual.target: 他对紧急呼叫做出了瞬间地反应。

bilingual.source: Call an ambulance immediately if someone is injured.
bilingual.target: 如果有人受伤，立即呼叫救护车。

bilingual.source: If the duplicator jams, call the maintenance team for help.
bilingual.target: 如果复印机卡纸了，请呼叫维修团队来帮忙。

bilingual.source: Cti allows call centers to manage calls more effectively.
bilingual.target: 计算机电话集成使呼叫中心能够更有效地管理电话。

bilingual.source: Training on the acd is essential for all call center employees.
bilingual.target: 对所有呼叫中心员工进行自动呼叫分配系统培训是必要的。

list.abstract: CALL通常指REMOTE CALL，是一种注入外部EXE程序从外部调用函数的技术。CALL的使用一般需要编写复杂的汇编代码。

yingyinNormal.en: Aaron to Dave. All radio communication should be done using call signs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 亚伦呼叫戴夫，所有通讯要用呼号进行。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, you know, I did unsettle it. I called you from the train. Just before the explosion, so 7:46 this morning they paged you with a call.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我刚还真就搅和了。我从车上给你打电话了，就在爆炸之前今早7点46分，他们呼叫了你…

yingyinNormal.en: Actually, Indian Monopoly's just like regular, except the money's in rupees, instead of hotels you build call centers, and when you pick a chance card, you might die of dysentery.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其实印度大富翁和普通版差不多，只是钱变成了卢比，酒店变成了呼叫中心，而已如果你抽机会卡，有可能死于痢疾。
好的，巴斯，打电话吧。
我等下再打。
要不要打电话给喷口水的？
小姐，怎么称呼你？
我的名字不重要。
这是记忆之树。
莫妮卡，我是理查，打电话给我。
我们该通知谁？通知所有人。
随便你。
妈，我再回电给你，是的。

yingyinNormal.en: Call me when you figure it out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等你想明白了再给我打电话。
我们还是打给儿童机构吧？

yingyinNormal.en: Are you ever gonna call me? What?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你以后会打电话给我吗？什么？

yingyinNormal.en: Let me go, and we'll call it even.
yingyinNormal.zh: 放我走，就算扯平。

yingyinNormal.en: She got my number to call me back…
yingyinNormal.zh: 她有我的电话号码可以回电给我……

yingyinNormal.en: Can we call him every night? Sure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们每天晚上都可以打电话给他吗？当然可以。

yingyinNormal.en: You can't call me back for a week?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你整整一周都不回复我？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 记得；回想起；回忆起；叫回；召回；提醒；使人想起；使忆起；使想起；回索
n. 喊叫；强烈冲动；欲望；使命感；天职；职业；专业

word_family.mean: v. 呼喊；喊；叫；给（婴儿；动物）取名；短暂拜访；打电话给；叫做；名为；敦促；大声说

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 呼叫；呼唤；求某人来；命令...出动；下令罢工；公开批评(某人)

sense_info_list.en: know or address someone by a particular name

examination_example.sentence: One company that's doing this is <highlight>called</highlight> Blendoor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一家做这个的公司叫做Blendoor。

examination_example.sentence: You can <highlight>call</highlight> their views stupid, or joke about how ignorant they are.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以说他们的观点很愚蠢，或者拿他们有多无知开玩笑。

examination_example.sentence: Mental health has commonly been <highlight>called</highlight> conscience, instinct, wisdom, common sense, or the inner voice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 心理健康一般被称作良心、本能、智慧、常识或者心灵之音。

sense_info_list.en: a demand for something to happen

examination_example.sentence: A group of Labour MPs are bringing in the new year with a <highlight>call</highlight> to institute a UK "town of culture" award.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一群工党议员呼吁新一年要设立一个英国“文化之城”奖。

examination_example.sentence: A response to Reding's <highlight>call</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对Reding呼吁的回应。

examination_example.sentence: Last year, European Commission Vice President Viviane Reding issued a <highlight>call</highlight> to voluntary action.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 去年，欧盟委员会副主席Viviane Reding呼吁采取自愿行动。

sense_info_list.en: the fact of people wanting or needing a particular thing

examination_example.sentence: Scientific work <highlight>calls</highlight> for a critical mind.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学工作需要批判性思维。

examination_example.sentence: Simply arranging a meeting, making a phone <highlight>call</highlight>, or hosting an event is not an "official act."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 简单地安排一个会议，打一个电话，或者举办一个活动都不是“官方行为”。

examination_example.sentence: Koziatek's school is a wake-up <highlight>call</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Koziatek的学校是一个警钟。

sense_info_list.en: ask someone to come to you

examination_example.sentence: They prefer to come and go as opportunity <highlight>calls</highlight> them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们跟随机会的召唤，来去自由。

sense_info_list.en: shout or say something loudly to attract one's attention

examination_example.sentence: A large part of evaluation is <highlight>calling</highlight> out bad arguments.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很大一部分评价都是在大声说出不好的论点。

sense_info_list.en: (of a person) pay a brief visit
decide officially to have a particular event or take particular action

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 召唤某人；命令工人罢工；向...挑战要求进行决斗
召集；给...打电话；顺道来访
取消；喝退；命令停止攻击

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 记得；回想起；回忆起；叫回；召回；提醒；使人想起；使忆起；使想起；回索

word_family.mean: v. 呼喊；喊；叫；给（婴儿；动物）取名；短暂拜访；打电话给；叫做；名为；敦促；大声说

sense_info_list.en: know or address someone by a particular name

examination_example.sentence: As the ocean warms, a body of water <highlight>called</highlight> the Antarctic Polar Front is being pushed further south.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着海洋变暖，被称为南极锋的水体被进一步推向南方。

examination_example.sentence: Penguins, like other seabirds and marine mammals, occupy higher levels in the food chain and they are what we <highlight>call</highlight> bio-indicators of their ecosystems.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 企鹅与其他海鸟和海洋哺乳动物一样，在食物链中占据较高的位置，它们被称为其生态系统的生物指示器。

examination_example.sentence: The Cascadia Earthquake Zone is big enough to compete with San Andrea (it's been <highlight>called</highlight> the most dangerous fault in America).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 卡斯卡迪亚地区震区足够大，可以与圣安德里亚(在美国被称为是最危险的断层)相媲美。

examination_example.sentence: Researchers at the University of Washington created a massive database of faces--they <highlight>call</highlight> it MegaFace.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 华盛顿大学的研究人员创建了一个庞大的人脸数据库——他们称之为“海量人脸识别库”(MegaFace)。

sense_info_list.en: a demand for something to happen

examination_example.sentence: Greenpeace is <highlight>calling</highlight> for an immediate halt to fishing in areas being considered for sanctuary status.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 绿色和平组织呼吁立即停止在被考虑视为保护区的地区捕鱼。

examination_example.sentence: Joseph <highlight>calls</highlight> sharing his knowledge network through peer-to-peer learning a core piece of the company's culture.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Joseph 呼吁通过点对点来分享公司的知识网络，学习公司文化的核心内容。

examination_example.sentence: The average student's debt upon graduation now approaches $40, 000, and as college becomes ever more expensive, <highlight>calls</highlight> to make it "free" are multiplying.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，学生在毕业时的平均负债接近4万美元。上大学变得越来越贵，让它“免费”的呼声越来越高。

examination_example.sentence: These include the centuries-old custom of "bul", where leaders would <highlight>call</highlight> a temporary stop to fishing for key species.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些措施包括具有数百年历史的“布尔”风俗，领导者将呼吁暂时停止捕捞关键物种。

examination_example.sentence: Although <highlight>calls</highlight> to share data often concentrate on the moral advantages of sharing, the practice is not purely altruistic (利他的).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管呼吁共享数据通常集中在共享的道德优势上，但是这种做法并非纯粹是利他的。

examination_example.sentence: Let me just <highlight>call</highlight> my mom and let her know I'll be home a little bit later.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 让我给我妈打个电话告诉她我晚点回来。

examination_example.sentence: Let's go back to my house and we can <highlight>call</highlight> the repair shop, and you can have some tea and cookies too.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 回我家吧，我们可以给修理店打电话，你也可以喝点茶，吃点饼干。

examination_example.sentence: Through regular regional educational meetings, a large annual meeting, individual farm visits and thousands of phone <highlight>calls</highlight>, the Amburghs pass on the principles pasture management.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过定期的区域性教育会议，大型年会，个人农场访问和数千个电话，Amburghs 传达了牧场管理的准则。

examination_example.sentence: Some researchers argue that doodling (涂画) activates the brain's so-<highlight>called</highlight> default circuit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些研究人员认为，涂鸦激活了大脑所谓的“默认回路”。

examination_example.sentence: The so-<highlight>called</highlight> "ghostwriting" can take various forms: books, articles, autobiographies, and even social media posts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所谓的“代笔”可以采用各种形式：书籍、文章、自传，甚至社交媒体帖子。

sense_info_list.en: shout or say something loudly to attract one's attention

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>calls</highlight> for the retraining of unskilled mining workers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它呼吁对不熟练的采矿工人进行再培训。

sense_info_list.en: (of a person) pay a brief visit
the fact of people wanting or needing a particular thing
ask someone to come to you

word_usage.usage:
call作动词，表“命名”, “称呼”时，可接以名词或形容词充当补足语的复合宾语。
示例：Please call me Lucy.
请叫我露西。

call常与介词搭配，构成固定动词短语：
（1）表示“看望”或“短暂拜访”，用call on/upon。
（2）表示“顺道拜访”，用call in。
（3）表示“在某地段时间停留”或“停靠”，用call at。

call作名词，作“叫声”“通话”等解时，为可数名词。
示例：I got a call from my father.
我接到了父亲的电话。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指给某人或某物取名字以某人或某物的特征称呼。
指用特别的名字、符号或词句来称某人或某物。
含义最泛, 指给人或物命名以示区别或便于记忆。
指大声说话或喊叫, 以引起某人的注意。
一般指因恐惧、痛苦、惊奇等而喊叫。
多指因高兴、愤怒、痛苦、惊讶等突发感情而高声喊叫。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 记得；回想起；回忆起；叫回；召回；提醒；使人想起；使忆起；使想起；回索

word_family.mean: v. 呼喊；喊；叫；给（婴儿；动物）取名；短暂拜访；打电话给；叫做；名为；敦促；大声说

examination_example.sentence: I could give you his phone number if you want, and you could <highlight>call</highlight> him and ask him questions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你愿意，我可以给你他的电话号码，你可以打电话问他问题。

examination_example.sentence: Other choices, in descending order of personalization, are: a real-time phone <highlight>call</highlight>, a voice-mail message, a handwritten note, a typewritten letter, and the most unfriendly is email.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以个性化降序排列的其他选择包括：实时电话，语音邮件，手写便条，打字机信件，最不友好的是电子邮件。

examination_example.sentence: I prefer to make a <highlight>call</highlight> if I'm in a hurry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果有急事，我更喜欢打电话。

sense_info_list.en: know or address someone by a particular name

examination_example.sentence: In 2011, a University of North Carolina business professor named John Kasarda published a book <highlight>called</highlight> Aerotropolis: The Way We'll Live Next.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2011年，北卡罗来纳大学商学教授 John Kasarda 出版了一本书，名为《 航空城：未来我们的生活方式》。

examination_example.sentence: In a 2011 USPS case study, the agency emphasized its massive infrastructure as a "unique federal asset" to be <highlight>called</highlight> upon in a disaster or terrorist attack.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在2011年美国邮政的一份案例研究中，该机构强调其庞大的基础设施是在灾难或恐怖袭击中需要调用的一份“独特的联邦资产。”

examination_example.sentence: A new Pew Research Center analysis highlights the implications of these changes for the most basic element of their lives — where they <highlight>call</highlight> home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 皮尤研究中心的一项最新分析突显了这些变化对于其生活中最基本的要素——他们称之为家的地方——的诸多影响。

examination_example.sentence: Some asked subjects about incidents where someone close to them-family or friend-had <highlight>called</highlight> them by another person's name.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些调查询问受测者，他们身边的人、家人或朋友是否曾用另一个人的名字称呼他们。

examination_example.sentence: The project is <highlight>called</highlight> Writing On It All, and it's a participatory writing project and artistic experiment that has happened on Governor's Island every summer since 2013.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项活动名叫 Writing On It All，是一个参与式写作项目和艺术实验，自2013年以来每年夏天都会在总督岛举行。

examination_example.sentence: Like cats, babies appear to engage in what's <highlight>called</highlight> "preferential looking"— looking longer at things that are interesting or unusual than things they perceive as normal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 和猫一样，婴儿似乎也会进行所谓的“优先寻找”，即比起它们认为正常的事物，它们看有趣或不寻常的事物的时间更长。

examination_example.sentence: "People are cheering and holding their carts in the air," says Giovanni Giorgio, who helped organize the march with a grass-roots organization <highlight>called</highlight> Generazione.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Giovanni Giorgio 说：“人们欢呼雀跃，将手推车举向空中。”他与一个名为 Generazione 的基层组织一起组织了游行。

examination_example.sentence: The feeling is just pure. But, he worries, if tourism isn't managed and his fellow locals continue to move to the mainland, his generation might be the last who can <highlight>call</highlight> themselves native Venetians.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种感觉是纯粹的。但是，他担心，如果旅游业得不到管理，当地人继续搬迁到大陆，他们这一代可能是最后一代可以自称为威尼斯人的人了。

sense_info_list.en: a demand for something to happen

examination_example.sentence: This research provides a useful direction for organizations whose products and services <highlight>call</highlight> for integrated and creative solutions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 本研究提供了一个有用的方向，为那些产品和服务需要整合和创造性解决方案的组织。

examination_example.sentence: Dr. Michael Yogma is a Harvard Medical School pediatrician who led the drafting of the <highlight>call</highlight> to arms.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Michael Yogma是哈佛医学院的儿科医生，由他领导呼吁这项提议。

examination_example.sentence: For decades, activists have <highlight>called</highlight> for schools to offer anti-racism or multicultural curricula.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几十年来，积极分子一直呼吁学校提供反种族主义或多元文化课程。

sense_info_list.en: the fact of people wanting or needing a particular thing

examination_example.sentence: More than 50 workers at the store have signed a letter <highlight>calling</highlight> for a permanent security guard following a series of incidents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在发生一系列事件后，50多名店员签署了一封公开信，呼吁设立一名永久的保安人员。

sense_info_list.en: ask someone to come to you

examination_example.sentence: Also, mothers may <highlight>call</highlight> on their children more often than fathers, given traditional gender norms.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另外，考虑到传统的性别规范，母亲可能比父亲更经常地呼唤孩子。

sense_info_list.en: shout or say something loudly to attract one's attention

word_usage.usage:
call常与介词搭配，构成固定动词短语：
（1）表示“看望”或“短暂拜访”，用call on/upon。
（2）表示“顺道拜访”，用call in。
（3）表示“在某地段时间停留”或“停靠”，用call at。

call作动词，表“命名”, “称呼”时，可接以名词或形容词充当补足语的复合宾语。
示例：Please call me Lucy.
请叫我露西。

call作名词，作“叫声”“通话”等解时，为可数名词。
示例：I got a call from my father.
我接到了父亲的电话。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指给某人或某物取名字以某人或某物的特征称呼。
指用特别的名字、符号或词句来称某人或某物。
含义最泛，指给人或物命名以示区别或便于记忆。
指大声说话或喊叫，以引起某人的注意。
一般指因恐惧、痛苦、惊奇等而喊叫。
多指因高兴、愤怒、痛苦、惊讶等突发感情而高声喊叫。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 短暂访问者；打电话者；宾戈游戏的开号者；喊出舞步的指挥；比赛（或运动）讲解员
v. 记得；回想起；回忆起；叫回；召回；提醒；使人想起；使忆起；使想起；回索

word_family.mean: v. 呼喊；喊；叫；给（婴儿；动物）取名；短暂拜访；打电话给；叫做；名为；敦促；大声说

examination_example.sentence: Thank you for <highlight>calling</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 感谢您的来电。

examination_example.sentence: I got a rescue <highlight>call</highlight> from a woman in Muttontown.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我接到了马特顿镇一个女人的救援电话。

examination_example.sentence: The man who had his bright lights on came over and told Larry he had made an emergency <highlight>call</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那个亮着灯的男人走过来，告诉拉里他打了个紧急电话。

sense_info_list.en: know or address someone by a particular name

examination_example.sentence: At the beginning of the year, the artist built a piece <highlight>called</highlight> "Strawpocalypse".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今年年初，这位艺术家建造了一件名为“稻草末日”的作品。

examination_example.sentence: Little wonder the Federal Duck Stamp Program has been <highlight>called</highlight> one of the most successful conservation programs ever initiated.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 难怪联邦鸭票计划被称为有史以来最成功的保护计划之一。

examination_example.sentence: It used to be <highlight>called</highlight> the "year off" between school and university.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它曾被称为中学和大学之间的“间隔年”。

sense_info_list.en: ask someone to come to you

examination_example.sentence: Labor unions recently struck a deal with a group of companies limiting the number of hours that independent contractors can be on <highlight>call</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 工会最近与一些公司达成协议，限制独立承包商的待命时间。

examination_example.sentence: If there is anything I feel I cannot handle, I will <highlight>call</highlight> you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果有什么我觉得应付不来的，我会给你打电话。

examination_example.sentence: One thing is for certain —Larry went above and beyond the <highlight>call</highlight> of duty by getting so close to the burning vehicle!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有一件事是肯定的——拉里如此接近燃烧的汽车，超出了他的职责范围！

sense_info_list.en: shout or say something loudly to attract one's attention
a demand for something to happen

examination_example.sentence: In these cultures, silence is a <highlight>call</highlight> for reflection.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这些文化中，沉默是为了激发反思。

word_usage.usage:
call sb. names 骂人
call sb.'s name 喊某人的名字

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指给某人或某物取名字以某人或某物的特征称呼。
指用特别的名字、符号或词句来称某人或某物。
含义最泛，指给人或物命名以示区别或便于记忆。
指大声说话或喊叫，以引起某人的注意。
一般指因恐惧、痛苦、惊奇等而喊叫。
多指因高兴、愤怒、痛苦、惊讶等突发感情而高声喊叫。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 短暂访问者；打电话者；宾戈游戏的开号者；喊出舞步的指挥；比赛（或运动）讲解员
v. 记得；回想起；回忆起；叫回；召回；提醒；使人想起；使忆起；使想起；回索
n. 喊叫；强烈冲动；欲望；使命感；天职；职业；专业

word_family.mean: v. 呼喊；喊；叫；给（婴儿；动物）取名；短暂拜访；打电话给；叫做；名为；敦促；大声说

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 回电话；回拨；叫（某人）回来
召集；给…打电话；顺道来访
名片；电话卡；电话计费卡；行为；结果

sense_info_list.en: know or address someone by a particular name

examination_example.sentence: Some people <highlight>call</highlight> plastic the "wood" of the future.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有人称塑料为未来的“木头”。

examination_example.sentence: The earth is often <highlight>called</highlight> the ocean planet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 地球通常被称为海洋星球。

examination_example.sentence: His mother <highlight>called</highlight> him Robbie when he was a baby.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他还是个婴儿的时候，他妈妈叫他罗比。

examination_example.sentence: Also, we never visit a friend's house without <highlight>calling</highlight> first.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，我们从没不打电话就去朋友家。

examination_example.sentence: Let's <highlight>call</highlight> Cathy and she may know something about it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 让我们打电话给凯茜，她可能会知道一些事情。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>called</highlight> my friends to see whether they'd like to go.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我打电话给我的朋友，看他们是否愿意去。

sense_info_list.en: ask someone to come to you

examination_example.sentence: I was often nervous at school, worried about whether the teachers would <highlight>call</highlight> on me in class.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我在学校经常觉得紧张，担心老师会不会在课上叫我。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Call</highlight> time is usually bright and early, so I try to get to bed at a reasonable hour.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 召集时间通常很早，所以我尽量在合理的时间上床睡觉。

examination_example.sentence: And trust me, most women really hate wolf <highlight>calls</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相信我，大多数女人都讨厌狼叫。

sense_info_list.en: a demand for something to happen

examination_example.sentence: They tried their best to <highlight>call</highlight> on everyone to raise money for Wuhan.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们尽全力号召大家为武汉募捐。

examination_example.sentence: How are Chinese people <highlight>called</highlight> on to greet each other?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国人是如何被期望去互相问候的？

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Call</highlight> for scientists to predict when the next solar storm will happen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 呼吁科学家预测下一次太阳风暴在何时发生

sense_info_list.en: shout or say something loudly to attract one's attention

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>called</highlight> out nervously, "Mom, where's Charlie?"
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他紧张地喊道：“妈妈，查理在哪里？”

examination_example.sentence: If the person doesn't stop,  cry for help by <highlight>calling</highlight> out the name of a teacher whose office is nearby.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果这个人没有停下来，大声喊附近办公室老师的名字来寻求帮助。

sense_info_list.en: the fact of people wanting or needing a particular thing

examination_example.sentence: The forming of good habits needs time and <highlight>calls</highlight> for effort and hard work at first.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 良好习惯的形成需要时间，首先需要努力和勤奋。

examination_example.sentence: You should <highlight>call</highlight> for a grown-up who can lead the person back to bed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你应该找一个成年人，他可以带那个人回到床上。

examination_example.sentence: When he went towards the clerk at the train office, he presented his <highlight>calling</highlight> card.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他走向火车办公室的职员时，他出示了他的名片。

sense_info_list.en: (of a person) pay a brief visit
decide officially to have a particular event or take particular action

examination_example.sentence: Last Saturday morning, the head teacher <highlight>called</highlight> a meeting of parents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 上周六早上，班主任召开了一次家长会。

examination_example.sentence: Behaving badly or angrily, name-<highlight>calling</highlight> and going on about things being "unfair" won't change the final result.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 行为恶劣、生气、骂人以及不断埋怨事情“不公平”并不会改变最终结果。

word_usage.usage:
call作动词，表“命名”, “称呼”时，可接以名词或形容词充当补足语的复合宾语。
示例：Please call me Lucy.
请叫我露西。

call常与介词搭配，构成固定动词短语：
（1）表示“看望”或“短暂拜访”，用call on/upon。
（2）表示“顺道拜访”，用call in。
（3）表示“在某地段时间停留”或“停靠”，用call at。

call作名词，作“叫声”“通话”等解时，为可数名词。
示例：I got a call from my father.
我接到了父亲的电话。
